name: Cupchef
description:
This is my entry for the Mini Jam 94, my first game jam ever. Also, this is my first time using ct.js.

Since the theme is 'baking' I had to place the game in a cozy looking kitchen. The limitation of using only 2 buttons in the whole game made me rethink the usual way of creating menus. Instead of using buttons, options are chosen by walking off screen.

Authors: Me :)

Software used: Ct.js and Piskel

Source code: https://github.com/andrej-ilic/cupchef
